detaileddescription.para: GNT - The GLib Ncurses Toolkit

Set whether a widget can take focus or not.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if the widget can take focus.

detaileddescription.para: gnt_widget_destroy: : The GntWidget instance.
Emits the "destroy" signal notifying all reference holders that they should release .

Show a widget. This should only be used for toplevel widgets. For the rest of the widgets, use gnt_widget_draw
instead.

Draw a widget.
widget
The widget to draw.
Trigger the key-press callbacks for a widget.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the key-press was handled, FALSE otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (GntWidget *widget, GntMouseEvent event, int x, int y)
memberdef.name: gnt_widget_clicked

detaileddescription.para: Trigger the 'click' callback of a widget.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the event was handled, FALSE otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (GntWidget *widget, int x, int y, int width, int height)
memberdef.name: gnt_widget_expose

detaileddescription.para:
Hide a widget.
widget
The widget to hide.

Set the position of a widget.
widget
The widget to reposition.
x
The x-coordinate of the widget.
y
The x-coordinate of the widget.
Get the position of a widget.

parameterdescription.para: Location to store the x-coordinate of the widget.
Location to store the y-coordinate of the widget.

detaileddescription.para:
Request a widget to calculate its desired size.
widget
The widget.

Get the size of a widget.
widget
The widget.
width
Location to store the width of the widget.
height
Location to store the height of the widget.
Set the size of a widget.

simplesect.para: If the widget was resized to the new size.

detaileddescription.para:
Give or remove focus to a widget.
widget
The widget.
set
TRUE of focus should be given to the widget, FALSE if focus should be removed.
TRUE if the focus has been changed, FALSE otherwise.

Set the name of a widget.
widget
The widget.
name
A new name for the widget.

Get the name of a widget.
widget
The widget.
The name of the widget.

Activate a widget. This only applies to widgets that can be activated (eg. GntButton)
widget
The widget to activate.
Confirm a requested a size for a widget.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the new size was confirmed, FALSE otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Set the visibility of a widget.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the widget is visible or not.

detaileddescription.para: Check whether the widget has shadows.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the widget has shadows. This checks both the user-setting and whether the widget can have shadows at all.
